changelog: v1.5.8: Fix NSIS step — choco install nsis unconditionally, call full path C:\Program Files (x86)\NSIS\makensis.exe.
changes: FIX: deploy.yml NSIS step now runs 'choco install nsis -y' unconditionally, then calls full path 'C:\Program Files (x86)\NSIS\makensis.exe' directly — avoids PATH refresh issue mid-script
